summary: When a wealthy old man appears to have been "frightened to death" by a cat, Miss Jane Marple suspects one of his four relatives, all heirs to his estate, of his murder.
cast: Margaret Rutherford|Stringer Davis|Robert Morley|Flora Robson|Charles 'Bud' Tingwell|Gordon Harris|Robert Urquhart|Katya Douglas|James Villiers|Noel Howlett|Finlay Currie|Duncan Lamont|Kevin Stoney|Frank Atkinson|Roger Avon|Wallace Bosco|Jack Dearlove|Charles Gilliard|Fred Griffiths|George Holdcroft|Joan Ingram|Pat Lewis|Jack Mandeville|Bess Rogers|Paddy Smith|Guy Standeven
